== @font-face (CSS 2.0 / CSS 3.0 Fonts Module Level 3) ==

The @font-face rule is not supported. Support is planned with version 2.0.1 of CssMin. See also: [http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-fonts/ CSS Fonts Module Level 3]

== @page ==

@page is not supported. See also: [http://www.w3.org/TR/CSS21/page.html#page-box 13.2 Page boxes: the @page rule].

== Left curly brace in selectors strings ==

Left curly braces in selectors are not supported. This will fail:

{{{
a:link[href~="abc{def"]
}}}

== Right curly brace in declaration value strings ==

Right curly braces in declaration value strings are not supported. This will fail:

{{{
q
	{
	content: "abc}"
	}

}}}
